Klasse SecurityConfig

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.spring.security.VaadinWebSecurity
com.spirit.application.SecurityConfig
@EnableWebSecurity @Configuration public class SecurityConfig extends com.vaadin.flow.spring.security.VaadinWebSecurity
Security configuration for the application, extending VaadinWebSecurity to configure custom security features for Vaadin-based applications.

It sets up a custom login view, password encoding, and authentication provider.

Annotations:

  • @EnableWebSecurity: Enables web security configuration for the application.
  • @Configuration: Marks this class as a configuration class for Spring Security.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • SecurityConfig

      public SecurityConfig(SecurityService securityService)
      Constructor initializes the security services required for authentication.
      Parameter:
      securityService - the SecurityService used for loading user details and handling authentication.

  • Methodendetails

    • configure

      protected void configure(org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.builders.HttpSecurity http) throws Exception
      Configures HTTP security settings.

      Sets the login view to LoginView.

      Setzt außer Kraft:
      configure in Klasse com.vaadin.flow.spring.security.VaadinWebSecurity
      Parameter:
      http - the HttpSecurity object to configure the HTTP security.
      Löst aus:
      Exception - if an error occurs during configuration.

    • passwordEncoder

      @Bean public org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder()
      Bean definition for the PasswordEncoder used for hashing passwords.
      Gibt zurück:
      a PasswordEncoder instance, specifically a BCryptPasswordEncoder.

    • customAuthenticationProvider

      @Bean public org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationProvider customAuthenticationProvider()
      Bean definition for the custom authentication provider used in the application.

      This provider handles the authentication of users by verifying the username and password.

      Gibt zurück:
      an AuthenticationProvider instance configured with the security service and password encoder.
